failure.message: failed Adding to recent localities by tapping on a suggestion

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Adding to recent localities by tapping on a suggestion
Given I have just performed a search for "Abbotsford, VIC 3067" When I tap the search bar Then I should see "Abbotsford, VIC 3067" in the "Recent Locations" list
Message:
org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: Could not find element containing text: 'Abbotsford, VIC 3067' System info: os.name: 'Linux', os.arch: 'armv7l', os.version: '2.6.35.10-g7b95729', java.version: '0' Driver info: driver.version: unknown System info: os.name: 'Mac OS X', os.arch: 'x86_64', os.version: '10.7.2', java.version: '1.6.0_29' Driver info: driver.version: RemoteWebDriver (NativeException) features/realestate-com-au/Common/Search/recent_localities.feature:16:in `Then I should see "Abbotsford, VIC 3067" in the "Recent Locations" list'
